column3: 東京都統計年鑑（平成30年）TOKYO STATISTICAL YEARBOOK ( 2018 ) ２０  司法・警察・消防 20  JUSTICE, POLICE, AND FIRE FIGHTING SERVICES

column9: 20-14  歩行者がわの事故原因による人身事故発生件数及び死傷者数 （平成26〜30年） 20-14 TRAFFIC ACCIDENTS CAUSED BY PEDESTRIANS RESULTING IN INJURY OR DEATH AND PERSONS KILLED OR INJURED IN THE ACCIDENTS ( 2014-2018 )
注 1) 発生件数，死傷者数とも第1当事者からみた数である。
2) 第1当事者とは，過失（違反）がより重いか又は過失（違反）が同程度の場合にあっては，被害がより小さい方の当事者をいう。
3) 調査不能とは，違反行為の種別が不明な場合をいう。
Note: 1) "Accidents" and "Killed or injured" are counted from the first party perspective.

2) The party whose degree of negligence (violation) is more serious than the other party is the first party. When the degree of negligence (violation) is the same, the party that suffers less damage is the first party.
3) "Cause undetermined" refers to cases for which the kind of violation committed is unknown.
資料：警視庁総務部文書課 「警視庁の統計」 Source: Metropolitan Police Department, TMG
